overview:
Alex Roe is publisher and principal writer of the magazine/blog website Italy Chronicles which he founded in 2005 as Blog from Italy.

Selected articles written by Alex Roe Italy Chronicles appear on Business Insider Europe and Italy Chronicles content was featured on international news site Globapost.com. Alex has been interviewed about Italian affairs by Britain’s BBC and by Australian radio a number of times on Italian affairs. He appeared in television in the USA as part of a program on life in Italy.

Articles on Italy Chronicles cover many aspects of Italy - from news and politics to travel, as well as food and wine, lifestyle, art and book reviews.

Alex is an experienced webmaster who has an in-depth knowledge of the Wordpress cms platform. He also knows HTML and CSS, and is familiar with image processing and editing applications such as Photoshop and DxO optics.

Alex is also familiar with social media systems, in particular Facebook and Twitter. His @newsfromitaly presence on Twitter has over 7500 followers.

In addition to his web presence, Alex Roe, through his business Englishisin, also acts as a trainer and media consultant and holds courses in Italian and English on writing press releases in English for media relations master students.

Since late 2002, Alex Roe has been working with the Business School of Italian publishing and training group Il Sole 24 Ore. In addition, Alex Roe works as a communications media consultant to Italian companies including a major Italian coffee maker.

Alex speaks Italian fluently and has lived in Milan, Italy where he is based, for around 15 years. He is from the United Kingdom.
